privacy.title: Privacy Policy
content: At MKB Tours & Travel, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and safeguard your data when you visit our website or use our services.
We may collect personal details that you voluntarily provide, including but not limited to:
Payment and billing details (for invoicing purposes)
This information is collected when you submit enquiry forms, request bookings, download our travel guide, or contact us through phone, email, or WhatsApp.
When you visit our website, we may automatically collect certain information about your device, including:
Pages visited and time spent on pages
We use the information we collect to:
Process bookings and provide travel services
Contact you regarding enquiries, confirmations, and trip support
Send service updates and promotional offers (with your consent)
Improve our website, services, and customer experience
Maintain legal, accounting, and safety records
Detect, prevent, and address technical or security issues

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance website functionality and user experience. You can instruct your browser to refuse cookies or alert you when cookies are being sent. Some website features may not function properly if cookies are disabled.
Essential Cookies: Required for website operation and booking forms
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand visitor behavior and improve services
Preference Cookies: Remember language, location, and display settings

We may use third-party service providers such as payment gateways, hosting services, and analytics tools to operate our website and manage bookings. These parties are granted access only for necessary functions and are bound by confidentiality obligations.

We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your data, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
Request deletion of your information (subject to legal requirements)
Our services are intended for users above 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors.
Your data may be stored on servers located in India or other regions. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for secure data handling.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page along with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this page periodically.
If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
content: Welcome to MKB Tours & Travel. By booking our services or using our website, you agree to be bound by the following Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully before confirming your trip.
Kindly note that 5% GST is applicable for GST billing. All terms and conditions mentioned below are applicable for our outstation one-way and round-trip services.
Each trip has a specific kilometre limit and, for certain packages, an hour limit. Any usage beyond these limits will be charged additionally as per applicable rates.
Airport entry charges, if applicable, are not included in the fare and must be paid extra by the customer.
All tolls, parking fees, interstate taxes, and other government charges are not included in the fare and must be paid as per actuals.
For travel between 9:45 PM and 6:00 AM, a night allowance will be applicable and payable directly to the driver.
Customers must confirm all destinations and cities in advance. Changes or additions during the journey may not be possible and can result in extra charges.
For safety and vehicle performance, air-conditioning may be switched off during steep hill climbs.
To promote eco-friendly travel, your vehicle may run on CNG. Refueling stops may be required during the journey.
The package includes one pick-up point and one drop point only. Local sightseeing or multiple drops within the city are not included unless specified.
Ideal for single-destination travel with flexible pick-up and drop options across India.
Complete return journeys with customizable itineraries and multiple destination coverage.
These Terms & Conditions shall be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes shall fall under the jurisdiction of Mumbai courts.
MKB Tours & Travel reserves the right to modify these Terms & Conditions at any time without prior notice. Updated terms will be posted on this page.
For any clarification regarding these Terms & Conditions, please contact us:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Shree MKB Tours & Travel and how it works.
faq.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Feel free to reach out to our team.

questions.question: What is MKB Tours & Travel?
questions.answer: MKB Tours & Travel is a Mumbai-based travel company providing reliable cab services and customized tour packages across India, including hill stations, pilgrimage tours, beach holidays, and heritage trips.

questions.question: What services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer local rentals, airport transfers, outstation one-way and round trips, Mumbai Darshan, pilgrimage tours, and customized holiday packages with professional drivers and well-maintained vehicles.

questions.question: Do you provide pickup and drop services?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide door-to-door pickup and drop services for all our local, outstation, airport, and tour packages.

questions.question: Can I customize my travel itinerary?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We offer fully customizable travel packages based on your preferred destinations, travel dates, vehicle type, and budget.

questions.question: What types of vehicles are available?
questions.answer: Our fleet includes Maruti Dzire, WagonR, Ertiga, Innova Crysta, and other comfortable vehicles suitable for individuals, families, and groups.

questions.question: Are your drivers experienced and verified?
questions.answer: Yes, all our drivers are professionally trained, background-verified, and experienced in long-distance and city travel to ensure safety and comfort.

questions.question: Do you provide 24/7 customer support?
questions.answer: Yes, our support team is available 24/7 to assist you with bookings, trip modifications, and emergency help during your journey.

questions.question: Do you organize pilgrimage tours?
questions.answer: Yes, we specialize in pilgrimage tours to destinations such as Shirdi, Trimbakeshwar, Pandharpur, Bhimashankar, Shani Shingnapur, and other sacred places across Maharashtra and India.

questions.question: Is advance booking required?
questions.answer: Advance booking is recommended, especially during weekends, holidays, and festival seasons, to ensure vehicle availability and best service.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept UPI, cash, and bank transfers. For corporate and long-distance bookings, advance payment may be required.

questions.question: Do you provide GST invoices?
questions.answer: Yes, GST invoices are available on request. A 5% GST is applicable for GST billing as per government norms.

questions.question: How can I contact MKB Tours & Travel?
questions.answer: You can call us at +91 84338 94555 or email us at Shreemkb@gmail.com for bookings, queries, and support.

about.title: About
about.heroAlt: Shree MKB Tours & Travels Team and Fleet
about.storyPara1: Shree MKB Tours & Travels was founded with a clear vision to make every journey comfortable, safe, and memorable. The company is owned and managed by Rushikesh Manohar Bhalekar, son of Manohar Keshav Bhalekar, after whom the company proudly carries the name MKB. Headquartered in Mumbai, we have been serving travelers across India for over 5 years with reliable transportation and thoughtfully curated tour solutions.
about.storyPara2: From scenic hill stations and beach holidays to spiritual pilgrimages, family vacations, corporate travel, and heritage tours, every journey is planned with personal attention to detail. Our focus on professional drivers, well-maintained vehicles, and transparent communication ensures a smooth, stress-free travel experience for every customer.
about.storyPara3: Today, Shree MKB Tours & Travels is trusted by 1000+ happy travelers for door-to-door pickup, flexible itineraries, and 24/7 customer support. Operating primarily from Mumbai, we provide premium travel services across Maharashtra, Goa, Gujarat, Karnataka, and beyond, with a strong commitment to safety, punctuality, and service excellence.
about.missionQuote: Safe Journeys. Trusted Service. Memorable Experiences.
about.passionDesc: Travel is not just our business‚Äîit is our passion. We put genuine care into every journey, ensuring that each trip is thoughtfully planned and personally managed.
about.excellenceDesc: We maintain high standards across our operations, from clean and comfortable vehicles to experienced drivers and well-organized itineraries, delivering consistent and premium travel experiences.
about.customerDesc: Our customers are at the center of everything we do. Your comfort, safety, and satisfaction guide every decision we make, before, during, and after your journey.
about.safetyDesc: Verified drivers, regularly maintained vehicles, transparent pricing, and dependable support ensure complete peace of mind while traveling with us.
about.bookletsDesc: Download our detailed travel booklets available in three languages. Each booklet provides comprehensive information about destinations, tour packages, pricing, and travel options, allowing you to plan your journey conveniently‚Äîeven offline.

about.servicesPageNote: Visit our Services page to discover the wide range of travel services we provide, including local and outstation travel, airport transfers, tour packages, corporate travel, and customized trip planning.
